mapper.select: select count(*) as count, TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE1, 'YYYY-MM') as PAY_DATE1, sum(PAY_COST1) as PAY_COST1,sum(PAY_COST2) as PAY_COST2, sum(PAY_COST3) as PAY_COST3 from PAYT where BUSINESSNUM=#{businessNum} and TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE1, 'YYYY-MM') =TO_CHAR(Sysdate, 'YYYY-MM') group by TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE1, 'YYYY-MM')
select count(*) from PORTFOLIOT where BUSINESSNUM=#{bNum}
